product_overview: A responsive React/Vite marketing site that presents company information, services, portfolio case studies and a contact form to capture leads.
core_goals: Present company mission, services and portfolio to prospective clients
Provide a simple, responsive navigation experience across desktop and mobile
Capture leads via a validated contact form
Ensure /services entry navigates users directly to the primary service detail
Keep pages performant and accessible for fast loading and discovery

features.name: Global Navigation
features.description: Responsive navbar present on every page allowing users to move between main sections (Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Contact). Includes a mobile menu variant.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click navigation link 'Services' -> See /services page
Navigate to / -> Open mobile menu -> Click navigation link 'Portfolio' -> See /portfolio page
Navigate to /about -> Click navigation link 'Contact' -> Click has no effect -> See current page unchanged (navigation did not occur)

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: A form on /contact that lets visitors submit name, email and message to generate leads. Client-side validation is applied and submissions surface success or error messages.
user_flows: Navigate to /contact -> Fill name field with valid name -> Fill email field with valid email -> Fill message field -> Click Submit form -> See success confirmation message
Navigate to /contact -> Fill name field -> Fill email field with invalid email -> Fill message field -> Click Submit form -> See inline validation error for email
Navigate to /contact -> Fill name field with valid name -> Fill email field with valid email -> Fill message field -> Click Submit form -> See server error message indicating submission failed

features.name: Service Redirection
features.description: When users visit /services the router redirects them to the first service item's detail view to simplify discovery of the primary offering.
user_flows: Navigate to /services -> Be redirected to first service detail page -> See first service detail content
Navigate to /services -> Redirect target missing or unavailable -> See /services list page with 'No services found' message
